Bond Cleaning Checklist: Agent-Ready Essentials

A practical checklist the agent actually checks — glass edges, tracks, skirtings and more.

Kitchen

  • Oven: racks, trays, glass edges
  • Cooktop & splashback
  • Drawers & doors inside/out

Bathrooms

  • Shower glass & tracks
  • Vanity & mirror
  • Toilet base & cistern
